website_summaries.verdict: Nice all-in-one kit at a reasonable price. Includes plenty of useful features that make it a good value.
pros: Ships with viewing screen and all components needed for installation
Infrared lighting ensures you can see in the dark
cons: Only a 130-degree viewing angle - less than some others
Some problems with video screen quality

customer_reviews.title: Frequent monitor failures
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of theses systems since late 2015. Every one has had the monitor fail a few months after the warranty expires. I have just ordered another monitor from another brand I hope will be more reliable- because my system is installed in a passenger van with a headiner replacing it all and going completely to a different brand system is a huge labor intensive operation. I've also had 1 of the cameras become fogged- this required me disassembling the camera (out of warranty) drying it out and resealing it myself. While this system has worked great when it works it is just not reliable. I do not recommend buying any of this company's products.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works good at night and the wired solution means no noise ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this over a year now and am thrilled with the difference it's made. I mounted the screen just above the rear view mirror in my class C and it is very effective at seeing what is right behind me as well as the hitch area. Works good at night and the wired solution means no noise or wavy lines. Only issue would be that when you turn up the volume loud enough to hear someone guiding you backwards... You have to remember to turn it back down or you hear road noise when you're driving. I haven't added another camera yet, but hope to some day. A great unit for the price point!!!
customer_reviews.author: susan l whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Great product support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my black/white backup system on 2003 motorhome. Assembled system before starting installation. - worked fine. But after I pulled the long cable through the motorhome using the previous path for wiring, it no longer worked. Called support and explained what I had done (pulled too hard on connector and broke wires internally) the support lady immediately made arrangements to ship a replacement cable. - at no cost to me. They really stand behind their product and help the customer. Oh yeah: it works excellently
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McLellan

customer_reviews.title: This was a FANTASTIC RV Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: After months of evaluating the different aftermarket backup units available, I landed on this one and am so grateful for my purchase! Owning an RV that didn't come with a backup camera, this was a necessary upgrade. I also use it as a full-time rear-view camera and it works marvelously! The picture is excellent, and I really appreciate the mic/speaker feature when backing into tight spots. The installation was easy and relatively quick, and the quality-to-price factor was fantastic! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera. Our RV was not equipped with one and I insisted we buy one. Nice clear picture. It turns on automatically when backing up, but you can also turn it on the the camera is on at all times. Works great at night. Installation was too much for my husband so we had to have it professionally installed. Piece of advice. Make sure the cable works before installing in your coach. We had a faulty cable and it was only discoverd after the installation. Amazon gave us a replacement but it cost us an additional $150 to remove and reinstall the cable. Best of luck!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality leaves a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Installed this system in a 2000 class A RV, replacing my B&W system. I guess this day in age, I was expecting a crystal clear, sharp color picture. Well I got 1 out of three (color). The picture is really no better then my 18 year old system, just in color. i also ordered extra cable and an extra camera to install on our trailer when we pull, but my lack of enthusiasm finds it still sitting in the box six month later. I'd be curious if it's the display, the camera or both that need upgrading to get a sharp, HD like picture.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Odle

customer_reviews.title: like it OK but needs a better camera for reasons stated in updated review.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my 31 foot class C. Works great so far, After using it for a while I discovered that glare from the roadway almost washes out the picture when the sun is high. There is no way to adjust this from the menu. Tried a larger hood and a piece of dark window tint to no effect. The manual that comes with it is useless for setting up the system after installation. Picture quality is good on cloudy day or when driving thru shady areas otherwise it is a crappy camera. It should be able to adjust to glare but NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Barber

customer_reviews.title: Decided to spend money on a wired camera because of the bad reviews of some of the wireless cameras losing signal/poor ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed camera on a small cargo trailer about 12 feet long and installed the monitor on a 2013 Ford F-150. Decided to spend money on a wired camera because of the bad reviews of some of the wireless cameras losing signal/poor signal. This camera and monitor work great. Instead of hard wiring to a fuse or battery, I use the power from the cigarette lighter/power port, you can buy an adapter with bare leads and connect the wires. Works great. Has an inline fuse to protect device and can be configured for multiple cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is constructed to be very heavy duty and you really feel like you are getting your moneys worth. The installation was as easy as any wireless and the images are really good. Has a microphone so as to hear your partner can guide you in. Called for assistance and got right in and he knew what he was talking about. love the product and understand why they are rated no. 1.
customer_reviews.author: Samual L. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a larger vertical angle of view.
customer_reviews.text: My second one. Works great. Wish the vertical angle was a bit wider. I use them on trucks mounted at the top and in order to see my rear bumper, for backing up and parking, I can't also see all the way back, like a rear view mirror, which isn't absolutely necessary, but would be nice. Excellent night vision.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Use with your RV and save $$$
customer_reviews.text: Installed on 29' RV class C, and works great! We installed it above the window in the rear (not on the license plate), up high, so we could get a good view behind us. Easy to install camera (added a piece of metal above to keep rain/hose water from dripping onto camera...helps some). 4" screen is easy enough to view, and have it set up for when lights are on, screen shows whats behind us (not just when backing up), Wireless signal seems good for reception. RV vendor tried to sell us a $300 unit, but this one works quite well!
customer_reviews.author: FL Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We could not be happier with this product. The installation took a little over 2 hours, but much of that was putting together a game plan for placement of the camera and monitor. We were able to connect it to the reverse light circuit so the camera and monitor only come on when the vehicle is in reverse. The image is very sharp and clear and you can manage the details by utilizing the various menu functions. The menus are very easy to navigate, and the customizations cover most any application.The camera even has a mic that captures audio in the near vicinity. The installation was on a Ford E-350 12 passenger van.
customer_reviews.author: DesertYak

customer_reviews.title: Great Display
customer_reviews.text: Good price and fast delivery. Bought this for a mortorhome and plan to run continuously as a rearview mirror. Just tested it today and the display is excellent. Easy to wire up. In fact I only glanced at instructions. I plan to mount this inside the motorhome and won't need any outside drilling. Instead of wiring this to outside lights, I bought a cigarette lighter plug for $3.25 and connected the power wires to the plug. Powered up as soon as I plugged in and had great picture. If you plan to use as a backup camera, you'll probably have to mount outside
customer_reviews.author: TOM SIEMASZKO

customer_reviews.title: wrong size bracket mounting screws
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, simple to install and it just always works. I have 10 of these installed in my trucks with no complaints I give the product 5 starts but I recently ordered 2 sets of these and both came with screws that are too big to mount the camera to it's bracket. I'm having a hard time finding the right size screws so I may have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Haqq Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: This unit was EZ to install. DIYS! Requires, maybe four(4) hours. No more. IM a tard; Took me three(3) hours. If I can do so can you. Monitor is fantastic. The camera adjustment requires the use of the Allen wrench(use it as the thumb screws R2 tedious). Many menu selections. You may use or loose the distance grid. U can use or loose the the rear sound. The app was a 24 ft class C. Plenty, of extra wire. I would estimate 16 ft. DIY & save $900.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs & Mr. drs

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DEAL
customer_reviews.text: my old voyager B&W backup cam was shot. so i replaced it with this unit which was much less expensive than a new monitor from the original For a couple hundered bucks this is a great camera system. Nice clear picture good performance at night. Range markers and audio when triggered by backup lights.I can also turn it on manually to moniter my jeep on the trailer while underway. 3 camera hook ups port 3 for the backup and i used port 2 for a "hitch cam". came with the adapter for my add on camera which user RCA cables.
customer_reviews.author: BobD

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best-without doubt, camera system .Commercial Grade!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely-without doubt, the VERY best system and company to deal with....These cameras and monitors are COMMERCIAL GRADE and designed for huge fleet vehicles that live on the roads. This is my third camera system I have purchased from RVS Night vision is stunning
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This a nice backup camera system that doesn't break the bank. My husband installed it on our 31' motorhome. It provides quality images, which makes it much easier driving. The camera can provide two differnt views, which makes it great for general driving and a closer view for backing up. I had a faulty control unit that was replaced without any objections from the manufacture. I described the problem and they immediately diagnoised the potential problem and sent replacement parts. They decided it could be one of three items so they shipped all three. I had the parts within two days. That's what I call service! These are people you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: 🌟SL ColeTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Much better than previous versions.
customer_reviews.text: This device is an upgrade from the same one I purchased on 2012. The connectors have been upgraded and the pins don't bend as before. The lightweight screws that hold the camera have been upgraded to stainless cap screws. Very easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Tech

customer_reviews.title: Great camera system
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy enough, everything worked as stated, and the view is superb from the rear view camera. I like the hard wired approach to this system, no worries about interference or straying signal to another receiver. Good product for the price. The only thing, I had to leave out some screws on the camera mount to bracket to get the angle I needed. No problem, but will have to inspect occasionally to make sure it has not loosened. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years Camera fogs up
customer_reviews.text: Worked well enough for two years, but now, after about 10 mins of use the camera begins to fog up.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel J Wales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: After years of hard use in a commercial underground coal mine, these things still work and function like new.
customer_reviews.author: alex b.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I am mechanically adept, so with a bunch of zipties I was able to install everything like I wanted. I cut a small rectangular hole in the plastic rear "bumper cover" of my car, and bolted the camera to the metal bumper so that it peeks out the hole. The monitor had some interference (static, and a lighter band rotating down the screen) until I made sure the junction box did not touch any metal surfaces. (Multiple ground connections caused interference.)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Engineer Appraiser

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the actual Video Camera used in backing up my ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the actual Video Camera used in backing up my RV. It makes backing out of any place painless. BUT, I gave it a 4 because the small manual is terrible. The person who installed it for me is very knowledgable in installing this type of item and had to guess, based on experience, in several steps. I looked online for more information and could not find any.
customer_reviews.author: Din

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with camera for use as back up vehicle camera.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and installed multiple brands of rear view cameras on box trucks, rv's, forklifts.... this camera is by far the best quality I have used. I have replaced other brands that I purchased new because picture being so bad. I have purchased this brand numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Good picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these on my old Motorhome for several years and it worked great. Bought this one to put on my new to me Motorhome.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Portland

customer_reviews.title: great but somewhat vague instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 1 ton chevy dually w/7.5x9 utility bed. It is an extremely rugged built system (camera/monitor/wiring). I have an electrical background so wiring it up wasn't a problem but for someone who plans on doing a self install the instruction booklet is a little vague when it comes to actually wiring it into your vehicle. I wired into the auxiliary switch so it automatically powers off when the key is off. If there was a better wiring diagram for the do-it-yourself types I would have gave it a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Works Great in Alaska
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage sons pickup truck. Works great, even in -40 degree Alaska temps. Did have to solder the wires, otherwise they shake loose. Nice big screen and great camera range. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. York

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to an old truck
customer_reviews.text: My parents in law gave us their ranch truck to use for our outdoor adventures. We added a backup camera because we needed to see behind us when the truck bed was loaded with camping gear. Rear View Safety staff helped us get the unit up and running with great customer service. Thank you Shawn. As a side note, we installed it ourselves because a family member was an industrial electrician and had a lot of experience with electronics.
customer_reviews.author: BLR

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Rear View Safety back-up camera to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Rear View Safety back-up camera to replace an original camera system in my motorhome. The flush mount bracket I needed for the monitor was not included in the package I purchased. I called Rearview and the sales rep, Natalie was very helpful and set me up with the bracket I needed, she even sent it to me free and paid the shipping! The entire system is installed with the monitor in the original spot on the dash, and is working very well. Thanks to Rearview, and Natalie. Ricky Seitz, Carrollton, GA
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for price
customer_reviews.text: Works great! One star deducted because it took eight hours to insure watertight installation in our Winnebago Class C. Audio helps to hear if you blow a tire on car or tow dolly. Works as well as pricier models. Reminder: keep camera lens clean.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieAS

customer_reviews.text: I am glad I went for a more expensive set up. This is a wonderful product, the view is outstanding. Very easy to install electrically. I wanted to use the existing cig lighter on my Toyota rv which made the install even easier. I would buy it again in a heart beat,
customer_reviews.author: thomas g thacher

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to rv.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install. Added kill switch to power off when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: SS Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my ambulance rv since i had zero visibility behind me. This system works great and i leave it on all the time i'm driving as a rear view mirror. Just ordered a second camera to provide another angle of my hitch for hooking up my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Todish

customer_reviews.title: Installed in pickup truck.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a Titan pickup. System works well and easy to wire components together. Hardest part is deciding where to tap into truck's electrical system and mount components. A vehicle wiring diagram helps with this. Suggest that you lay out components first and try them before installation. Realized that I needed the license plate mounting bracket (RVS-401). Called Rear View Safety and they shipped immediately - had it within two days. You may want to look at the different products on their web site as they have a variety of installations, including a GPS option.
customer_reviews.author: rww

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This item as described, arrived on time in a excellent box in factory condition. Be advised that the monitor is 7 inches, bigger than most GPS monitors. After looking at the entire system I opted for professional installation. This is a heavy duty camera system that mounts securely and has enough cable to mount camera on back of a recreation vehicle and see the towed vehicle. Excellent product from quality shipper
customer_reviews.author: jriorda

customer_reviews.title: Bad menu instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward installation, but time consuming if you want a clean and hidden installation. Do it right! The operation instructions in the pamphlet for menu navigation is WRONG! WRONG! WRONG! This is a waste of printed information.
customer_reviews.author: dale

customer_reviews.title: Commercial grade quality...
customer_reviews.text: Still in the process of installing the system, but I will say all components are very well made! The aircraft cable ends on the 66' cable are MUCH better than the previous system I just returned. "Theirs" had loose fitting RCA jack connections, which made the video jumpy... RVS system is definitely commercial grade!!!
customer_reviews.author: stallion143

customer_reviews.title: One great camera
customer_reviews.text: This unit is nothing but great! I wanted a camera for backing up my rv trailer. This unit does the job. Crisp clear picture guid lines let you know the distance from any objects behind you. Easy to install. Took me about one hour to put up the camera and run the wire to my pickup. I'm very pleased,with this camera and monitor .
customer_reviews.author: john pelkey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality on this set up
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture quality on this set up. High def for sure. Two negatives. 1) wiring connectors are HUGE, pass though holes had to be at least 3/4". 2) Trying to find a spot to mount the power module was a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Home Skillet

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's hard to beat. Installation is simple and performance is more then adequate. Installed in a 32' rv and use it as a rearview mirror as well as for backing. As far as audio goes....well let's just say roll down the window if you're using a spotter.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Great system for your $$$
customer_reviews.text: This unit is just great. I had a mirror mount system and it just wasn't right for a 25 ft. motorhome. I ordered the 33 ft. cable, the 66 ft. was just to long, and have about 5 ft. of excess cable. Monitor is very clear, camera is a little heavy so had to mount through bolts to make sure camera stays in place. I also made a bracket so monitor would mount to windshield where mirror was. It works great and doesn't block vision.
customer_reviews.author: tikitiki

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Want another camera to add to it one down lower facing hitch and the othe angled hire to see wats behind me
customer_reviews.author: David R Landreth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really impressed. Easily compares to what that large camping chain sells for over 3 times as much. Picture looks good and install was a breeze, well, except for running that cable the full length of my 36 foot motorhome. But, that part of the install was due to the coach manufacturer, not this product. Looks like it will do a really good job for us. Also, good instructions and everything needed was included.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gaines

customer_reviews.title: RV Camera
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a couple months. Works great so far. I have posted a YouTube video of the install... [...] I think Rear View put a link on their website.. so if you want to see how I installed it take a look. Worked great for backing boat down the ramp behind my 26ft RV. Also like being able to see boat while driving down road. Would recommend as it seems to be high quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our Tadi Brothers system with this one. This one is much better. Heavier wiring is the biggest upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: A quality setup
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've purchased. The first came in early 2011 and it has been working fine the last three years. I learned quickly how essential this is with a box truck. The rear camera takes a lot of the fear out of driving one of these things. So now with another such truck -- only larger -- I ordered another camera setup. The new unit arrived today and the quality is still there. No surprises. I look forward to installation.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Jay

customer_reviews.title: so far so good..
customer_reviews.text: so far so good... i use it on my f250 with A.R.E. commercial topper.. i have many trailers.. very easy to back up on a dime to hitch up. and makes backing up with people around a ..lot safer.
customer_reviews.author: TreyBoB

customer_reviews.title: Complete package!
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the second box, the first returned because of missing parts. This has the same problem. Someone should check this before it is shipped. Will return, not sure if I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck L

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! WHAT A GREAT CAMERA SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: This camera system is the best one I have tried, yes it wired and pain to install but once it was up and running the picture was clear and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far
customer_reviews.text: Good product so far, but the instructions are inadequate. I installed mine to be on all the time in my RV so I could use it like a rear view mirror. The gridlines do not activate unless the "trigger" for that video source is energized. I tied this to the reverse lighting circuit and now it turns on the grids when I am backing up. The picture quality is pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great and gives a very nice picture. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: not an easy task. I connected all ends and
customer_reviews.text: I managed to installed the wire from the inside front top, under my motorhome, to the outside rear top, not an easy task. I connected all ends and.. wow, what is this, Vas is Das behind my RV, round unidentified objects, wow, am I a fish??? I did not ordered a camera with "fish eye" lens. Just look at the pictures they advertise on line and on the installation menu, not the same. The Sales Representative emailed me something about RU setting in the menu, there is no RU setting....who aRe yoU kidding?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with purchase. The instruction manual isn’t too detailed so I emailed customer support on how to adjust volume (you simply hit the arrow buttons up or down) and I got a response with a couple hours. Great price and great safety addition to RV. P.s. I had it professionally installed at a stereo installation place for about $250.
customer_reviews.author: nsh

customer_reviews.title: These camera's are great! The first setup I used on a 32' ...
customer_reviews.text: These camera's are great! The first setup I used on a 32' 5th wheel and flat towed a Jeep behind it and needed something to be able to watch the jeep. These cams are great! The next one I put on our motor home, which worked just as good as the first! I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Xj Chad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 32" Motorhome. Running the cable from the back to the front wasn't fun, but the 60' cable was more than enough, and I didn't want to risk poor reception and picture quality on the wireless models. Once installed, this system works excellent! Great picture, night vision works very well. (You do not get a color picture in night vision, but it is very clear and super easy to see behind you in pitch dark!!) I would definately recommend this product to others...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tisdale

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: After searching through many systems, both wired and wireless I decided to purchase this unit. What a bargain. I installed it using the existing wiring in my Motor Home by removing the plugs and splicing the wires using the wiring chart in the instruction manual. Works great and what an improvement over the original Weldex black and white system
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Grier

customer_reviews.title: Longevity life very short!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for two trips in motor home!! Then malfunction???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good back up camera, used on mechanic service truck around the dusty farm.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great product
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a great product. I actually ordered additional cameras and am using this on a indstrial 65 ton hydraulic crane, as a reverse camera and have a camera pointed at the cable spool to keep an eye on the spool.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great price for such a high-quality camera system, and very easy to install. The hardest part was taking time to run the cable from the front of the motorhome to the back. I rather spend money on this camera, then my insurance deductible , due to backing into something.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Almost Ideal
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars if it wasn't for the poor documentation. I have lots of extra parts that I have no idea what they are for. There are 3 dip switches that remain a total mystery to me. WorKed great right out of the box however. Adjustment screws for the camera are tiny and difficult to manipulate with my fat fingers but do the job well. It wasn't much fun running the cable from the rear of my RV to the front but more than enough is supplied to compensate for torturous routing requirements. I am looking forward to connecting two more cameras to use as side view and security cameras.
customer_reviews.author: DesertReader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, used with backup third light cam what a gem.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Class "C" RV
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Christmas present for our RV. Our RV is a class "C", 31 feet long with limited view through the rear window during driving or backing up. With this camera I am able to leave it on while driving and see clearly if someone is driving to close to the bumper or check on my cargo i.e: bicycles, bumper cargo rack or vehicle being towed. When backing/Reverse it has a built in microphone I can hear the person directing me for direction or safety such has children in the area. I would highly recommend having the camera for your RV/truck. Best thing it's American made.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Does operate well as MH tow camera
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. Program in control need improved. Doesn't work well as tow camera in motor home.
customer_reviews.author: pin name

customer_reviews.title: Works on my Off Road Side by Side
customer_reviews.text: Cures lack of rear view from SxS, cage mounted, spare tire/wheel. So far, so good in a rugged service.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time = success
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd camera system I purchased for my bus. The 1st was a wireless system which was too much interferance from Bluetooth devices. 2nd was a china look-a-like wired version of the safety rear view brand I purchased off Ebay, during installation I pulled the cable through a flexible conduit and the cable broke, very very poor quality. 3rd and final was this system which was only $30 more than the previous but quality is far superior and the cable pulled through with no issues. Picture is excellent and I really like the sound. A++++++++
customer_reviews.author: KRichmond

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Painless purchase, came quicker than expected, a real value. This was a replacement for a 16 year old system. Running the cable from the rear camera to the front of the Class A Motorhome was time consuming but required only basic tools, screw drivers, drill, etc. There is no standard for number of wires, or conector configuration so the existing cable had to be replaced on mine. All other aspects of installation were quick and easy. Picture crisp and correct, has switch for mirror or non mirror.
customer_reviews.author: kenhigdon

customer_reviews.title: Once connectors added and connected the camera worked perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what I wanted. Wanted for my camping trailer. Major problem was having to cut the wire coming from the camera and adding connectors so it could be disconnected from truck. Once connectors added and connected the camera worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good unit.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Quality fittings. Still working well after about 1 year of use. Rear camera housing has rusted already but that's my only real gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great product, major installation effort
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backup camera for my 1995 Roardtrek 190 Popular, based on excellent reviews. I tested the camera and monitor with a 12V DC battery and it gives a clear color picture. The installation has taken several days of intermittent effort, first selecting a route for cable runs and then fishing wires through my drilled holes. Have a plan for the installation before you start. The instructions are only minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: great quality camera
customer_reviews.text: great quality camera, but a serious PIA to wire it through the RV. It would have been really nice to have it as plug and play, also. We wired it to a DC adaptor anyway...as I like it to be on full-time when driving, not just backing up.
customer_reviews.author: MTC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 tadi brother camera both failed. This is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Ciccarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Commercial Grade Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We are a fleet maintenance company & we have purchased a lot (5+) of these units to install in our customer's medium duty trucks. We are very pleased with quality/ workmanship of the product & the ease of the installation. The first unit was installed about eight (8) months ago & it is still performing well. We will continue to purchase this item & would highly recommend it to other customers.
customer_reviews.author: N.C.

customer_reviews.title: i love this system
customer_reviews.text: very thing works great the camera and the cables very long and the monitor all works just like it said it would i put this camera on the roof of my motorhome and run the cable down 30 feet to the front and hook the monitor on the top of the windsheild and the picture was great and it works very good at night time driving with very little light am very happy with this camera
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: I should have gotten it earlier
customer_reviews.text: Was everything it said it was. I like it very much even in full sun I can see display. It does however shows nothing in the shadow of your truck in full mid afternoon daylight. Everything on camera is the reverse of actual so when they use the mirrors as your primary they are right. This will keep us from damaging the trucks rear equipment and salt spreader.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Memoli

customer_reviews.title: Be careful  when installing  the cable.
customer_reviews.text: Remember to read all the instructions before installing. The sound come on when the blue wire is installed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grosscup

customer_reviews.title: Great well built product
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about the camera, monitor and all the heavy duty components included in the installation package. The intended purpose of this whole package was for installation on a RV, bus, or other large vehicle, but I had this installed on a standard size pickup truck to aid in trailer towing. The picture is sharp and clear under all conditions and makes backing my trailer a easy maneuver instead of a chore.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Reassurance while backing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make backing my large van easier and to check my trailer load while driving. This will make backing my trailer safer also. I now need to find a way to keep it clean while driving on dusty roads. I haven't tried the DVD part.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Slattery

customer_reviews.title: This camera is a great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit in my 30 foot class C motor home. I mounted the monitor on top of the cab through the head liner. It installed fast and looks great. there was more than enough wire to fish through the head liner down the A post and under the dash near the dog house where the module is mounted. I mounted the camera in the back and ran the wire through the inside of the motor home. This was the toughest part of the job. My wife helped! I also installed a toggle switch to key in the back up Grid and microphone function as i didn't want to hook in to the reverse wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Postal

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product; Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After an exhaustive search for a rear view camera, I decided to order the 7" color system from Rear View Safety. The weather warmed up enough that I was able to install it last weekend. Everything was fine except for the wiring harness. I called Customer Service and the representative said he would send me a new one. It arrived the very next day. I hooked everything up and was amazed at the clarity of the image on the monitor. I highly recommend this system to anyone in the market for a rear view camera.
customer_reviews.author: Karl R. Hettel

customer_reviews.title: Improved color screen
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over the old black & White system. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the factory
customer_reviews.text: We have a 35' Hurricane Class A motorhome. The backup camera that came with the rig simply quit one day. I researched backup cameras and settled on this new camera with color LCD display. The installation instructions were poor, but I figured it out with the help of a couple of neighbors. The display is far superior to the original equipment (very heavy) black and white display. Overall, we are quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: talkslikeaduck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rear view camera for RVs and motorhomes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rear view video camera installed at the rear on my motorhome. This rear view camera is so valuable as far as safety while backing up a large motorhome. I can see if anything is at my rear. The distance grid lines on the monitor really helps how far the rear is to the wall. The grid line also helps me determine if I'm perfectly in the middle of the road between the road yellow line markers and the sides of the road. The infra-red is great in total darkness, you can see everything as if there are lights shining at the rear. The monitor is perfect size and very clear. This is a excellent buy, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Ron

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my wife's Starfire van. We like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera works as advertised. Can see clearly day or night. Had it for over a year and no problems yet. Installed it easily on my work van and I love it. Now I can back up within inches of things, and sometimes people freak out and bang on my van for me to stop reversing lol! Love scaring people in parking lots!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for our old B&W system in the RV.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace an older back & white CRT monitor and camera on our RV. Works perfectly ... Now debating on getting two side cameras to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: EMMNESS

customer_reviews.title: Nice system
customer_reviews.text: Just installed mine with a second camera for my ?motorhome. One for backup and second for use as a rear view mirror replacement. Picture quality s decent. Not high definition, but decent quality for its use. Easy to install.

customer_reviews.text: Super clear, and easy to install. I've had them installed for a several months and they are perfect for my Mercedes Sprinter

customer_reviews.text: What an excellent camera and monitor great quality great price can't beat it

customer_reviews.title: Rear Video System 7" LCD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based upon all of the previous positive reviews. The installation instructions were very good and the company website had more detailed installation guidance along with pictures of the process. The quality is there and the price is right.

customer_reviews.title: super camera
customer_reviews.text: for the money you can't go wrong... this camera out performs friends $900.00 camera and he was sick when I told him the cost of this camera.. several friend bought this camera after seeing mine... would buy again thanks rick g Wilmington nc

customer_reviews.title: Rear view safety 7" LCD backup camera
customer_reviews.text: This product came well packaged and arrived as seller described. It t appears to be well made and heavy duty. We returned it because it is more for commercial vehicles. The camera is more like the security style cameras. Overall, great looking camera with an amazing screen.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie920

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that performs well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camper van conversion. Product arrived quickly and well packed. Not a toy but a well made product. Installation was not difficult and unit has performed well. Operation of the menu was easily figured out. Image is certainly not HD quality but is better than I have seen in some newer automobiles.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set up. I have installed several of these on commercial trucks and they work great
customer_reviews.author: jasond

customer_reviews.title: The camera and monitor was easy to install but routing the cable underneath the couch ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera and monitor was easy to install but routing the cable underneath the couch was somewhat of a challenge. The system operates very easy with an excellent picture. The only problem I have is I bought the four year insurance package and havn't heard anything from them. Would like some kind of response to this question. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality built - Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced another brand's inferior product. It installs quickly and works flawlessly. Great picture quality. I back my truck up to the trailer and never beed to re-adjust. It's mounted on top of the receiver hitch pointed over top the trailer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Highly recommend! Very high quality parts, great picture, no lag, and lots of features. Best back camera I have ever had by far. I will buy for other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny N.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the RVS video camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like the RVS video camera. Installation was straightforward and the system performs as advertised. I particularly like the track indicator which lets you know where you are in your driving lane.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Morris

The rear view camera is completely weatherproof with an IP69K rating, strong and reliable, shock resistant, with a 20G vibration and 100G impact rating (highest in the industry), and the system comes with a full year warranty
